message: الحلقة الثالثة من AskDeveloper Podcast في الحلقة دي بنتكلم فيها عن بناء فريق العمل, و الخطوة الأولى و هي التعيين, و بنتكلم فيها من وجهة نظر الباحث عن العمل و من وجهة نظر صاحب العمل, و بنتكلم باستفاضة عن المقابلات الشخصية.
story: Mohamed Elsherif shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: EP03 - Team Building - Recruitment

data.message: That's good , how about adding the following book as a reference too http://www.amazon.com/Recruit-Hire-Great-Software-Engineers/dp/143024917X/ref=sr_1_1?s=books&ie=UTF8&qid=1363429156&sr=1-1&keywords=How+to+Recruit+and+Hire+Great+Software+Engineers
Haven't heard about it before, sounds like a good book

I read this one from Joel Spolsky "Smart and gets things done"  and he's talking about recruiting tips for employer how to hire someone who is smart and gets things done http://www.amazon.com/gp/product/1590598385?ie=UTF8&tag=joelonsoftware&linkCode=as2&camp=1789&creative=9325&creativeASIN=1590598385
